fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fire a winter melon at someone's house. 4 sun.
- Freeze someone's home. 2 sun.
- Produce sun at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your winter melon will deal a Powerful rampage attack, but deal an Unstoppable attack to the homeowner.
- Freezing a home roleblocks a target.
